content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_axe
inventory=[{"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 13}, {"type": "purple_concrete", "quantity": 30, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 11, "index": 18}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 22}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "netherrack", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 27}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 20, "index": 29}, {"type": "polar_bear_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 31, "index": 37}, {"type": "creeper_spawn_egg", "quantity": 32, "index": 39}, {"type": "wooden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 32, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a golden_axe, I need to first craft two sticks. The recipe for sticks requires bamboo, which I have in my inventory. Therefore, I will move the bamboo from slot 22 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
